name: ToastMaster
0:
”Alexa open Toast Master”
”Make a toast”
”Alexa ask Toast Master to play a favorite toast”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toast master
des:
With Toast Master you'll never be without a witty, funny, or thoughtful toast again. You can impress and intrigue your friends with the most brilliant toasts they've ever heard and be the life of the party!

Use the Toast Master skill by saying "Alexa open Toast Master" and a toast will immediately play.

You can also tell Toast Master to "give me a toast" or "make a toast". Alexa will then proceed to make an awesome toast for you. 

To hear another toast you can say "make a toast" again, or you can say "another one", or "give me another toast".

To replay the last toast say "replay toast".

You can add a toast to your favorites by saying "add to favorites". To remove a toast from your favorites say "remove from favorites". To play a toast from your favorites say "play a favorite toast".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
